tite: >Wash your hands properly with soap and water for 20 seconds
description: Use an alcohol-based hand sanitizer if water and soap are not available.

tite: Cover your nose and mouth with a tissue when you cough or sneeze
description: Dispose of tissue immediately after using. Cough and sneeze into the crook of your elbow if you do not have a tissue
Don't touch your eyes, nose or mouth wiht your hands to avoid getting infected.
Avoid shaking hands, kissing people hello and unnecessary contact with people in public.

tite: Stay home if you are ill
description: Avoid close contact with people who have flu-like symptoms or if you are feeling sick.
Clean your mobile devices using a wipe with 70% alcohol at least four (4) times daily.
